name: Azarketi Weapon Familiarity
summary: You are familiar with weapons that excel underwater.
description:
You are familiar with weapons that excel underwater. You are trained with crossbows, hand crossbows, longspears, spears, and tridents. In addition, you gain access to all uncommon azarketi weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial azarketi weapons are simple weapons and advanced azarketi weapons are martial weapons.Azarketi Weapon Familiarity Leads To...

Azarketi Weapon Aptitude, Azarketi Weapon ExpertiseTraitsAzarketi: Amphibious humanoids who live among the seas of the Inner Sea region, said to have descended from the people of Azlant. Sometimes known as gillmen or Low Azlanti.

Azarketis craft and use these weapons.
